settings.description: Change the settings of the bot.

language.description: Change the language of the bot.

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Change the timeout settings of the bot.

duration.name: duration
duration.description: Change the duration of the timeout.

reactions.name: reactions
reactions.description: Set whether the bot should add reactions to messages or not.

language.title: Error
language.description: The Langugage specified is not supported.

success.title: Success
success.description: The Settings have been updated. The new settings are displayed below.

noReactionPermission.title: Error
noReactionPermission.description: I don't have permission to add reactions to your message. If you dont want me to add reactions, please turn them off using the ``/settings`` command.

noTimeoutPermission.title: Error
noTimeoutPermission.description: I don't have permission to timeout members who spam. If you don't want me to timeout members, please turn it off using the ``/settings`` command.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: You have been timed out for spamming UwU's.
